text: Ndi pamene Ife tinamvana ndi ana a Israeli: “Musapembedze wina koma Mulungu yekha ndipo onetsani chifundo kwa makolo anu, kwa abale anu, kwa ana a masiye ndi kwa anthu ovutika, ndipo auzeni anthu kuti azichita zabwino. Pempherani pa nthawi yake ndipo perekani msonkho wothandizila anthu osauka”. Komatu inu mudabwerera m’mbuyo kupatula owerengeka okha ndipo simudalabadire china chilichonse
